paragraphDesc: Springtime and summer are notorious for daily thunderstorms. It is not uncommon for storms to cause fear and anxiety in a child.But if you understand what’s happening, that fear can turn into wonder. Nature is amazing!
The effects of added sugar intake — higher blood pressure, inflammation, weight gain, diabetes, and fatty liver disease — are all linked to an increased risk for heart attack and stroke, says Dr. Hu.
